featured.text: The Chinese emperor Shen Nung in 2737 B.C. introduced the drink.

definition.zh_def: 神，指超自然的存在或力量，通常與宗教或靈性有關。
definition.en_def: Shen refers to a supernatural being or force, often associated with religion or spirituality.
definition.example: In Chinese culture, shen are revered as powerful spiritual entities.
